msg: Fix the STDIN/OUT overriding process to handle gracefully cases, when
either or both are closed/bogus (the problem was only with useperlio

author: geoff
msg: copy apr_table_compress logic from later httpd versions in case mod_perl
is built against 2.0.46, as mod_perl now requires it internally.

author: geoff
msg: change <Perl> to <Perl > to maintain back compat to 2.0.46

author: stas
msg: - B::Deparse >= 0.61 is only available since 5.8.x, but unless a code ref is
blessed it'll work with older B::Deparse as well. Adjust the code to require 0.61
only if the code ref is blessed. otherwise require 0.60.
- add a blessed code ref test.

author: stas
msg: no need for the perl object in the pool accounting callback
